statements: SELECT * FROM ingredient_imports WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_name FROM ingredient_imports ORDER BY import_date DESC
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM ingredient_imports
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_imports FROM ingredient_imports WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Supplier'
SELECT import_date, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM ingredient_imports GROUP BY import_date HAVING total_quantity > 500
SELECT id, ingredient_name, quantity FROM ingredient_imports WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC, import_date ASC
SELECT supplier_name, ingredient_name, import_date FROM ingredient_imports WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers' ORDER BY import_date DESC
SELECT * FROM ingredient_imports WHERE ingredient_name LIKE '%sugar%' ORDER BY import_date ASC
SELECT id, quantity, supplier_name FROM ingredient_imports WHERE import_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, import_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name, COUNT(*) as total_imports FROM ingredient_imports GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_imports > 5 ORDER BY total_imports DESC
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity >= 100 AND quantity <= 500;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, ingredient_name, unit_price FROM suppliers JOIN ingredients ON suppliers.supplier_id = ingredients.supplier_id WHERE unit_price > 10.00;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Ingredients;
SELECT name, category, price FROM Ingredients WHERE category = 'Spices';
SELECT name, supplier_name, quantity, price FROM Ingredients WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_date, status FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM Ingredients WHERE category = 'Produce' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, supplier_name, quantity, unit FROM Ingredients INNER JOIN Suppliers ON Suppliers.id = Ingredients.id WHERE Suppliers.country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Ingredients WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT ingredient_id, supplier_id, SUM(ordered_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Orders GROUP BY ingredient_id, supplier_id HAVING total_quantity > 500;

SELECT supplier_id, MAX(ordered_quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(ordered_quantity) AS min_quantity FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Delivered' GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY max_quantity DESC, min_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM specialty_ingredients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM specialty_ingredients WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT name, origin FROM specialty_ingredients WHERE origin = 'Italy';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY name;
SELECT order_id, supplier_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM specialty_ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT suppliers.name, shipments.shipment_date, shipments.arrival_date FROM suppliers JOIN shipments ON suppliers.id = shipments.supplier_id WHERE suppliers.location = 'New York';
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.quantity, shipments.shipment_date FROM orders JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id WHERE orders.quantity > 50 ORDER BY shipments.shipment_date;

SELECT orders.order_date, specialty_ingredients.name, shipments.arrival_date FROM orders JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id JOIN specialty_ingredients ON orders.ingredient_id = specialty_ingredients.id WHERE orders.order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(orders.quantity) AS avg_quantity, suppliers.name AS supplier_name FROM orders JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.id GROUP BY suppliers.name ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_categories;
SELECT category_name FROM ingredient_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, country FROM suppliers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT ingredient_name, price FROM ingredients WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT orders.id, orders.order_date, suppliers.supplier_name, orders.total_price FROM orders INNER JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.id ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, price FROM ingredients WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, country, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM suppliers JOIN orders ON suppliers.id = orders.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name, country;
SELECT orders.id, order_date, total_price, supplier_name FROM orders JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.id;
SELECT ingredient_name, category_name FROM ingredients JOIN ingredient_categories ON ingredients.category_id = ingredient_categories.id;
